Package photos.models

Class DataSave

java.lang.Object
photos.models.DataSave
public class DataSave extends Object
This class handles the necessary functions for saving user data to disk.

      Loads the user's data from disk.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • saveAlbum

      public static void saveAlbum(Album album, File userDirectory)
      Save all the user's albums to disk.
      Parameters:
      album - The specified album to save. (Typically done in a loop to save all albums)
      userDirectory - The directory where the user data is located.

    • savePhotos

      public static void savePhotos(File userDirectory, Album album)
      Saves the photos of an album.
      Parameters:
      userDirectory - The directory where the user data is located.
      album - The specified album to save photos from.

    • deleteData

      public static void deleteData(String name, User user)
      Deletes the save data of an album.
      Parameters:
      name - The album name that needs to be deleted
      user - The user associated with the album.
